TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed EntityStates extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Represents the enumeration that identifies the state of an entity being tracked by the <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext">.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Services.Client.EntityStates Added = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The entity was added since the last call to <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Services.Client.EntityStates Deleted = int32(8)

Docs.summary: The entity was deleted since the last call to <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Services.Client.EntityStates Detached = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The entity was detached since the last call to <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Services.Client.EntityStates Modified = int32(16)

Docs.summary: The entity was modified since the last call to <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Services.Client.EntityStates Unchanged = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The entity is unchanged since the last call to <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A>.
